49 const planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr& ensureUpdated(const planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr& scene) {
50  // ensure scene's state is updated
51  if (scene->getCurrentState().dirty())
52  scene->getCurrentStateNonConst().update();
53  return scene;
54 }
55 
56 InterfaceState::InterfaceState(const planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr& ps) : scene_(ensureUpdated(ps)) {}
57 
58 InterfaceState::InterfaceState(const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& ps) : scene_(ps) {
59  if (scene_->getCurrentState().dirty())
60  ROS_ERROR_NAMED("InterfaceState", "Dirty PlanningScene! Please only forward clean ones into InterfaceState.");
61 }

63 InterfaceState::InterfaceState(const InterfaceState& other)
64  : scene_(other.scene_), properties_(other.properties_), priority_(other.priority_) {}
65 
66 bool InterfaceState::Priority::operator<(const InterfaceState::Priority& other) const {
67  // infinite costs go always last
68  if (std::isinf(this->cost()) && std::isinf(other.cost()))
69  return this->depth() > other.depth();
70  else if (std::isinf(this->cost()))
71  return false;
72  else if (std::isinf(other.cost()))
73  return true;
74 
75  if (this->depth() == other.depth())
76  return this->cost() < other.cost();
77  else
78  return this->depth() > other.depth();
79 }
80 
81 Interface::Interface(const Interface::NotifyFunction& notify) : notify_(notify) {}
82 
83 // Announce a new InterfaceState
84 void Interface::add(InterfaceState& state) {
85  // require valid scene
86  assert(state.scene());
87  // incoming and outgoing must not contain elements both
88  assert(state.incomingTrajectories().empty() || state.outgoingTrajectories().empty());
89  // if non-empty, incoming or outgoing should have exactly one solution element
90  assert(state.incomingTrajectories().empty() || state.incomingTrajectories().size() == 1);
91  assert(state.outgoingTrajectories().empty() || state.outgoingTrajectories().size() == 1);
92  // state can only be added once to an interface
93  assert(state.owner_ == nullptr);
94 
95  // move state to a list node
96  std::list<InterfaceState*> container;
97  Interface::iterator it = container.insert(container.end(), &state);
98  it->owner_ = this;
99 
100  // if either incoming or outgoing is defined, derive priority from there
101  if (!state.incomingTrajectories().empty())
102  it->priority_ = InterfaceState::Priority(1, state.incomingTrajectories().front()->cost());
103  else if (!state.outgoingTrajectories().empty())
104  it->priority_ = InterfaceState::Priority(1, state.outgoingTrajectories().front()->cost());
105  else // otherwise, assume priority was well defined before
106  assert(it->priority_ >= InterfaceState::Priority(1, 0.0));
107 
108  // move list node into interface's state list (sorted by priority)
109  moveFrom(it, container);
110  // and finally call notify callback
111  if (notify_)
112  notify_(it, false);
113 }
114 
115 Interface::container_type Interface::remove(iterator it) {
116  container_type result;
117  moveTo(it, result, result.end());
118  it->owner_ = nullptr;
119  return result;
120 }
121 
122 void Interface::updatePriority(InterfaceState* state, const InterfaceState::Priority& priority) {
123  if (priority != state->priority()) {
124  auto it = std::find_if(begin(), end(), [state](const InterfaceState* other) { return state == other; });
125  // state should be part of the interface
126  assert(it != end());
127  state->priority_ = priority;
128  update(it);
129  if (notify_)
130  notify_(it, true);
131  }
132 }
133 
134 void SolutionBase::setCreator(StagePrivate* creator) {
135  assert(creator_ == nullptr || creator_ == creator); // creator must only set once
136  creator_ = creator;
137 }
138 
139 void SolutionBase::setCost(double cost) {
140  cost_ = cost;
141 }
142 
143 void SolutionBase::fillInfo(moveit_task_constructor_msgs::SolutionInfo& info, Introspection* introspection) const {
144  info.id = introspection ? introspection->solutionId(*this) : 0;
145  info.cost = this->cost();
146  info.comment = this->comment();
147  const Introspection* ci = introspection;
148  info.stage_id = ci ? ci->stageId(this->creator()->me()) : 0;
149 
150  const auto& markers = this->markers();
151  info.markers.resize(markers.size());
152  std::copy(markers.begin(), markers.end(), info.markers.begin());
153 }
154 
155 void SubTrajectory::fillMessage(moveit_task_constructor_msgs::Solution& msg, Introspection* introspection) const {
156  msg.sub_trajectory.emplace_back();
157  moveit_task_constructor_msgs::SubTrajectory& t = msg.sub_trajectory.back();
158  SolutionBase::fillInfo(t.info, introspection);
159 
160  if (trajectory())
161  trajectory()->getRobotTrajectoryMsg(t.trajectory);
162 
163  this->end()->scene()->getPlanningSceneDiffMsg(t.scene_diff);
164 }
165 
166 void SolutionSequence::push_back(const SolutionBase& solution) {
167  subsolutions_.push_back(&solution);
168 }
169 
170 void SolutionSequence::fillMessage(moveit_task_constructor_msgs::Solution& msg, Introspection* introspection) const {
171  moveit_task_constructor_msgs::SubSolution sub_msg;
172  SolutionBase::fillInfo(sub_msg.info, introspection);
173 
174  // Usually subsolutions originate from another stage than this solution.
175  // However, the Connect stage will announce sub solutions created by itself
176  // (only in case of merge failure). To not confuse the display's SolutionModel
177  // we do not publish own IDs for them, but set those IDs to zero.
178  sub_msg.sub_solution_id.reserve(subsolutions_.size());
179  if (introspection) {
180  for (const SolutionBase* s : subsolutions_) {
181  // skip sub solutions with same creator as this
182  if (s->creator() == this->creator())
183  continue;
184  sub_msg.sub_solution_id.push_back(introspection->solutionId(*s));
185  }
186  msg.sub_solution.push_back(sub_msg);
187  }
188 
189  msg.sub_trajectory.reserve(msg.sub_trajectory.size() + subsolutions_.size());
190  for (const SolutionBase* s : subsolutions_) {
191  size_t current = msg.sub_trajectory.size();
192  s->fillMessage(msg, introspection);
193 
194  // zero IDs of sub solutions with same creator as this
195  if (s->creator() == this->creator()) {
196  auto it = msg.sub_trajectory.begin();
197  auto end = msg.sub_trajectory.end();
198  std::advance(it, current);
199  for (; it != end; ++it)
200  it->info.id = 0;
201  }
202  }
203 }
204 } // namespace task_constructor
205 } // namespace moveit
